title: [1508521049] Pork Chops with Sweet and Sour Peppers - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Gordon shows you Pork Chops with Sweet & Sour Peppers - and how to slice vegetables simply and easily. From Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course. Subscribe for more videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels: 

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
